PartyProfileParticipant.name: PartyProfileParticipant
PartyProfileParticipant.description: Represents information about the profile participant of a party.

Comments.description: The additional information about the participant.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the party profile participant is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the party profile participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the party profile.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The default access level for a role that a participant can have in the context of a parent record.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile associated with the participant.
